Classes

These are nice data types for dealing with... Data!

application
class application {
string type;
string name;
string text;
mapping vouches;
int time;
string domain;
}
application_type
class application_type {
string type;
string board;
string * questions;
int vouches_required;
int gl_requirement;
int qp_requirement;
int age_requirement;
int timeout;
string intro_text;
string responsibility;
}
